channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Uncollected bin, 29th December
item.description:
Despite reporting previously, as well to local Cllrs, this bin has not been collected for 4-5 weeks. This is unacceptable and unhygienic; please arrange for swift cleanup. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Path, North Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Romola Road SE24 white painted c, 29th December
item.description:
Romola Road SE24 white painted concrete side wall of 132 Norwood Road graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin & picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Romola Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Displaced and raised paving slabs, 29th December
item.description:
On the corner of Alabama and Albatross, several slabs have been wrongly replaced (raised several inches) which is a trip hazard
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albatross Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Norwood Road SE24 outside 331 (due north opposite, 29th December
item.description:
Norwood Road SE24 outside 331 (due north opposite Romola Road junction) road gutter drain 100% blocked. Opposite a traffic island so no parked cars to get in the way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 323, Norwood Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sunken pothole or sinkhole in road, 29th December
item.description:
It's about 1 foot across and .5 foot deep.. it seems to have appeared recently. The road surface is intact just this rather large dip in the middle of the road a bit like a pot hole /sink hole. It's just a bit worrying in case it gets worse . The road was only re surfaced in aug 25 so it's fairly recent on what is a lovey road surface. It out side falconhurst block but in the middle of the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Park, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Denmark Hill SE5 north bound side footpath - flyposter, 29th December
item.description:
Denmark Hill SE5 north bound side footpath (so Lambeth side) on the opposite side of the road to 121 is a bus stop (letter Q on top of bus stop flag). About 10 yards north of this is a post which has a A3 size polycarbonate boards secured with plastic zip ties so will need a knife and ‘snipes’ to remove. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin & Google Streetview link (post is just by bin): https://www.google.com/maps/place/Denmark+Hill,+London/@51.467061,-0.0906819,3a,50y,291.22h,86.96t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sZrGewCUo1KJTVyKcDSQc8Q!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D3.0442259521517485%26panoid%3DZrGewCUo1KJTVyKcDSQc8Q%26yaw%3D291.2220192570502!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x48760387399c59b7:0x90f5e638b7d644d0!8m2!3d51.4672008!4d-0.0908365!16zL20vMDVnZGs4?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwOS4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denmark Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Denmark Hill SE5 north bound side footpath (so, 29th December
item.description:
Denmark Hill SE5 north bound side footpath (so Lambeth side) directly opposite Grove Lane junction (just to the side of car park entrance) is a black metal cabinet (control traffic lights?) which is graffiti tagged.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denmark Hill, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Worn out road markings, 29th December
item.description:
On the junctions of Percy Road (with Bridge and Church Roads) the white markings, including the triangle are quite faded. Would someone inspect please with a view to refreshing? I don't think it's urgent but it would be good to inspect before too long please, as I almost missed the stop triangle when driving today. I don't think Percy is the only one, just the one that I noticed today in that area. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Percy Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brockwell Park SE24 – you might have to forward to th, 29th December
item.description:
Brockwell Park SE24 – you might have to forward to the Parks Dept. Just inside Norwood Road / Rosendale Road junction gate is a ‘Welcome to Brockwell Park’ sign board – enamel type sign. Said sign graffiti tagged. Can see said sign re Google Streetview link: Brockwell Park SE24 – you might have to forward to the Parks Dept. Just inside Norwood Road / Rosendale Road junction gate is a ‘Welcome to Brockwell Park’ sign board – enamel type sign. Said sign graffiti tagged. Can see said sign re Google Streetview link:
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Norwood Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible litter all over the street, 29th December
item.description:
There is litter all over the street that has been there for days and days - it is all down dog kennel hill and continues to Grove Vale. The streets look terrible, Southwark pls sort!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Grove Vale, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Veolia left bins unemptied, 29th December
item.description:
Please can Veolia or the company disposing of waste actually empty all bins and put them back in the right place? Bins were emptied on Crampton St today and not all were emptied. Veolia clearly knew these ones in the photos needed emptied but have left them, blocking access to a bike and wheelchair route. Please have these emptied asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Crampton Street, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
